column5: Heading to Sowden Lake this weekend on the English River near Ignace. Anybody been to the Ignace area recently? Fish are biting here in north central Minnesota on deep weed edges, though there's a cold front coming on... sounds like being flexible and trying something new until you find the fish is the way to go, though still looking for any thoughts, as I'll be trying a spot I haven't been to for 10 years. Anything helps - thanks!
Haven't been there for probably close to 20 yrs but used to do well on the smallies there, I couldn't catch a walleye to save my life though there. Would be interested in here a report when u return.
